revised_title: On the Reflection and Decomposition of Light at the Separating Surfaces of Media of the Same and of Different Refractive Powers
tldr: The author investigates the reflection and decomposition of light at the separating surfaces of media with the same and different refractive powers. The study reveals that the intensity of reflection decreases as the refractive indices of the media approach equality, and when they are equal, reflection ceases, and the ray continues in the second medium unchanged.
